Interface: LimitEvaluator

.TelemetryAPI~LimitEvaluator

A LimitEvaluator may be used to detect when telemetry values have exceeded nominal conditions.

Source:
  • api/telemetry/TelemetryAPI.js, line 36

Methods

(static) evaluate(datum, the) → {module:openmct.TelemetryAPI~LimitViolation}

Check for any limit violations associated with a telemetry datum.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
datum *

the telemetry datum to evaluate
the TelemetryProperty

property to check for limit violations
Source:
  • api/telemetry/TelemetryAPI.js, line 44
Returns:

metadata about the limit violation, or undefined if a value is within limits
